sn55.20:1.1: Atha kho bhagava—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—jetavane antarahito devesu tavatimsesu paturahosi.
sn55.20:1.2: Atha kho sambahula tavatimsakayika devatayo yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho ta devatayo bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.20:2.1: “Sadhu kho, avuso, buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanam hoti—
sn55.20:2.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.20:2.3: Buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanahetu kho, avuso, evam’idhekacce satta sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana.
sn55.20:2.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanam hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.20:2.7: Ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanahetu kho, avuso, evam’idhekacce satta sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana”ti.
sn55.20:3.1: “Sadhu kho, marisa, buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanam hoti—
sn55.20:3.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.20:3.3: Buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanahetu kho, marisa, evamayam paja sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana.
sn55.20:3.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanam hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.20:3.7: Ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanahetu kho, marisa, evamayam paja sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana”ti.
